title: Chili Lime Tilapia with Avocado Crema
directions: In a small bowl, mix the chili powder, cumin, cayenne, salt, and pepper with the lime juice and olive oil.
Using a basting brush, generously coat each side of the tilapia fillet with the marinade.
Bake fish for 12 minutes in a preheated oven until edges begin to crisp and fish is moist and flaky.
While fish is baking, prepare the crema. In a blender, combine avocado, cilantro, salt, pepper, lime juice, and yogurt. Blend until mixture is smooth.
Serve tilapia topped with avocado crema and freshly chopped cilantro.
